channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description: Whenever i run my server, it wont let anybody on my server, but when i type the ip in myself it wont let me on...but when i type in 127.0.0.1 it will let me on, so please Help me!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Your friends will not be allowed to connect through 127.0.0.1 as that is your own computer,
you will have to create a No-ip.Duc account and make an IP, use your computer IP (which you can find out Here), or you can choose to make a Hamachi server, which isn’t recommended.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Soul-Scape Soul-Scape
item.description:
@Soul-Scape wrote:

this simply means you didn’t portforward. The reason why you can connect to 127.0.0.1 is because thats localhost.
Try out this website
http://www.portforward.com/

if not go to the tutorial section and look for a server making guide. it will be stickied

edit:
here is the link
http://temp2.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Read full topic
